rows.name: help_text
rows.value:
Problem solving is central to rich tasks. This will cover techniques and attitudes of problem solving and the exploration of mathematical environments.

The nurturing of attitudes from the earliest ages forms an important foundation for successful problem solving. Willingness to take risks and acceptance of failure as a part of the process. Importance of persistence and grit. Growth mindset. etc.

This could be folded into other places, but it seems better to give a definite place to this very important topic that is typically not very well served.
